title: Minecraft Java版 战斗测试 第 8b 版 发布
author: AzureZeng
txt_content:
本帖最后由 AzureZeng 于 2020-8-22 15:38 编辑 
Here's combat test snapshot version 8b!
战斗更新测试快照 8b 来了!
Mostly balance changes this time, I think we're getting somewhere.
这次我们做的大部分都是平衡性修改，我(指本文作者)认为我们的改动已经达到了某个点上。

Features that have made a return:
回归的特性:
Returned eating interruption for getting hit (by players or mobs), also applies to drinking
回归了受到(玩家或生物)攻击时打断吃东西的设定，该设定同时适用于饮用物品Returned bow fatigue for holding the bow pulled, but it doesn't start until 3 seconds. Bow fatigue will also cancel out "critical arrows"
回归了当拉弓时的疲劳设定，但该设定在拉弓3秒后才会生效。拉弓疲劳生效时会同时会取消弓的暴击伤害。


Balance changes:
平衡性改动
Weapon enchantments are now included in the base damage when calculating crits and potion effects
在计算暴击和药水效果时，武器的附魔(所造成的伤害值)也包含在基础伤害中Strength I/II now adds +20%/+40% (was +3/+6 damage)
力量(药水效果) I/II 现在 +20%/+40% 的伤害(先前是 +3/+6 伤害)Instantenous effects on tipped arrows are now scaled by 1/8, just like the duration of other effects
正如其他效果的持续时长一样，药箭上的瞬间性效果(如瞬间治疗)现在以1/8的比例进行计算Healing potions now heal 6 points per level (was 4)
治疗药水现在每个等级治疗6点生命(先前是4点生命)Cleaving now adds +2/+3/+4 points of damage (was +1/+2/+3)
Cleaving(劈裂，非标准译名)现在会 +2/+3/+4 点伤害(先前是 +1/+2/+3)Liquid food (stews, honey, milk) can now be consumed faster (20 ticks, was 32 or 40 ticks)
现在液体食物(煲/炖菜，蜂蜜，牛奶)能吃的更快了(耗时20刻，之前是32或40刻)Potions can now be drunk faster (20 ticks, was 32 ticks)
药水现在也能喝的更快了(耗时20刻，之前是32刻)


Bug fixes:
Bug 修复:
Fixed shield protection arcs... again!
再次修复了盾牌的保护范围弧线Improved server-side attack range calculations, should hopefully mean fewer "false misses" but still needs more work
改进了服务器端的攻击范围计算，这应该意味着会带来更少的“假空刀”，但仍需大量工作进行优化


And as always, thank you all for your comments and feedback.
当然还是一样，我们对您的评论和反馈深表感谢。

Also, here is an Excel sheet I've been using to check damage values. It should be compatible with most other spreadsheet applications: https://launcher.mojang.com/experiments/combat/ed4ac6cf06a6828888f24b58416542dacf6e9960/Minecraft%20Damage%20Calculations%20%28v2%29.xlsx
并且，这里还有一个我(指本文作者)用于检查伤害数值的 Excel 表格。这个表格应该会兼容大部分电子表格程序: https://launcher.mojang.com/experiments/combat/ed4ac6cf06a6828888f24b58416542dacf6e9960/Minecraft%20Damage%20Calculations%20%28v2%29.xlsx
(该文件已作为本帖附件上传，见本帖末尾)

Please playtest the snapshots and share videos!
请测试游玩这个快照，并分享你的游玩视频。

Previous post here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/i9kdfh/combat_test_snapshot_version_7c/
上一个版本: https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1101881-1-1.html

Installation instructions:
安装指南:
Download this zip file: https://launcher.mojang.com/experiments/combat/9b2b984d635d373564b50803807225c75d7fd447/1_16_combat-5.zip
下载这个 zip 压缩文件: https://launcher.mojang.com/experiments/combat/9b2b984d635d373564b50803807225c75d7fd447/1_16_combat-5.zipUnpack the folder into your "versions" folder of your local Minecraft application data folder (see below if you are confused)
在你的"versions"文件夹中解压该压缩文件(若对此感到迷惑，请往下阅读)Create a new launch configuration in the launcher and select the "pending 1.16_combat-5" version
在启动器中新建一个启动器配置，并选中 pending 1.16_combat-5 版本Start the game and the remaining files will be downloaded
启动游戏，剩下的文件会自动下载Play in a new world! This version is not compatible with other snapshots!
请创建新存档进行游玩! 该版本与其他快照版本无法兼容!

Finding the Minecraft application folder:
如何找到你的 Minecraft 安装文件夹:
Windows: Press Win+R and type %appdata%.minecraft and press Ok
Windows: 按下 Windows+R 键，输入 %appdata%.minecraft，然后点击确定Mac OS X: In Finder, in the Go menu, select "Go to Folder" and enter ~/Library/Application Support/minecraft
macOS: 打开访达，在菜单中选择前往，然后选择“前往文件夹...”并键入 ~/Library/Application Support/minecraftLinux: ~/.minecraft or /home/<your username>/.minecraft/
Linux: ~/.minecraft 或 /home/<你的用户名>/.minecraft/


Once you have the launcher set up you can download the server files from there as well.
当设置完启动器配置后，你也可以在启动器中下载对应的服务器文件。

FEEDBACK SITE
反馈站点
In addition to replying here on reddit, you can head over to the feedback site to discuss specific topics here: https://aka.ms/JavaCombatSnap
除了在 Reddit 中回复，你也可以前往我们的反馈站点进行讨论: https://aka.ms/JavaCombatSnap
Cheers!
祝玩的开心!
